languages.text: "Слава Вольному Торговцу! Слава династии фон Валанциус!" {n}Триумфальный рев ваших подчиненных заставляет мостик вздрогнуть. Кажется, что сам корабль соскучился по свое{mf|му|й} влады{mf|ке|чице} и приветствует е{mf|го|е}.{/n}
"Glory to the Rogue Trader! Glory to House von Valancius!" {n}Your subjects' triumphant roar sends a tremor through the bridge. It is as though the ship itself is greeting its long-lost owner.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Слава Вольному Торговцу! Слава династии фон Валанциус!" {n}Триумфальный рев ваших подчиненных заставляет мостик вздрогнуть. Кажется, что сам корабль соскучился по свое{mf|му|й} влады{mf|ке|чице} и приветствует е{mf|го|е}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Glory to the Rogue Trader! Glory to House von Valancius!" {n}Your subjects' triumphant roar sends a tremor through the bridge. It's as though the ship itself is greeting its long-missed owner.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

traits.locale_text: "Glory to the Rogue Trader! Glory to House von Valancius!" {n}Your subjects' triumphant roar sends a tremor through the bridge. It is as though the ship itself is greeting its long-lost owner.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: «¡Gloria {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente! ¡Gloria a la casa von Valancius!». {n}El clamor triunfal de tus súbditos provoca una sacudida en el puente. Es como si la propia nave estuviese saludando a su {mf|dueño|dueña} después de una larga ausencia.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Rogue Trader! Glory to House von Valancius!" {n}Your subjects' triumphant roar sends a tremor through the bridge. It is as though the ship itself is greeting its long-lost owner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡Gloria {mf|al|a la} Comerciante Independiente! ¡Gloria a la casa von Valancius!». {n}El clamor triunfal de tus súbditos provoca una sacudida en el puente. Es como si la propia nave estuviese saludando a su {mf|dueño|dueña} después de una larga ausencia.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: “荣耀归于行商浪人！荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！”{n}在船员胜利的吼叫声中，整座舰桥都在微微颤抖，仿佛这艘舰船本身在向失踪已久的主人致意。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Rogue Trader! Glory to House von Valancius!" {n}Your subjects' triumphant roar sends a tremor through the bridge. It is as though the ship itself is greeting its long-lost owner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “荣耀归于行商浪人！荣耀归于冯·瓦兰修斯王朝！”{n}在船员胜利的吼叫声中，整座舰桥都在微微颤抖，仿佛这艘舰船本身在向失踪已久的主人致意。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: « Gloire {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} ! Gloire à la maison von Valancius ! » {n}Le rugissement triomphal de vos sujets fait trembler toute la passerelle. C'est comme si le vaisseau lui-même accueillait {mf|son propriétaire disparu|sa propriétaire disparue} depuis longtemps.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Rogue Trader! Glory to House von Valancius!" {n}Your subjects' triumphant roar sends a tremor through the bridge. It is as though the ship itself is greeting its long-lost owner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Gloire {mf|au seigneur-capitaine|à la seigneure-capitaine} ! Gloire à la maison von Valancius ! » {n}Le rugissement triomphal de vos sujets fait trembler toute la passerelle. C'est comme si le vaisseau lui-même accueillait {mf|son propriétaire disparu|sa propriétaire disparue} depuis longtemps.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーに栄光あれ！フォン・ヴァランシウス家に栄光あれ！」{n} 臣下の勝利の咆哮がブリッジを震わせる。まるで船そのものが、長い間行方不明だった持ち主を迎えているかのようだった。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Rogue Trader! Glory to House von Valancius!" {n}Your subjects' triumphant roar sends a tremor through the bridge. It is as though the ship itself is greeting its long-lost owner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーに栄光あれ！フォン・ヴァランシウス家に栄光あれ！」{n} 臣下の勝利の咆哮がブリッジを震わせる。まるで船そのものが、長い間行方不明だった持ち主を迎えているかのようだった。{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Es lebe {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}! Es lebe Haus Valancius!" {n}Das triumphale Brüllen deiner Untertanen lässt die Brücke erzittern. Es ist, als würde das Schiff selbst {mf|seinen lange verschollenen Besitzer|seine lange verschollene Besitzerin} begrüßen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Rogue Trader! Glory to House von Valancius!" {n}Your subjects' triumphant roar sends a tremor through the bridge. It is as though the ship itself is greeting its long-lost owner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Es lebe {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin}! Es lebe Haus Valancius!" {n}Das triumphale Brüllen deiner Untertanen lässt die Brücke erzittern. Es ist, als würde das Schiff selbst {mf|seinen lange verschollenen Besitzer|seine lange verschollene Besitzerin} begrüßen.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster

languages.text: "Hür Tacir çok yaşa! Von Valancius Hanesi çok yaşa!" {n}Tebaanın zafer kokan kükremesi, köprüyü titretiyor. Sanki geminin kendisi, kaybettiği sahibini selamlıyormuş gibi hissediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Glory to the Rogue Trader! Glory to House von Valancius!" {n}Your subjects' triumphant roar sends a tremor through the bridge. It is as though the ship itself is greeting its long-lost owner.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hür Tacir çok yaşa! Von Valancius Hanesi çok yaşa!" {n}Tebaanın zafer kokan kükremesi köprüyü titretiyor. Sanki geminin kendisi, kaybettiği sahibini selamlıyormuş gibi hissettiriyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: VoxMaster
